about: The Carl H. Lindner College of Business Student Action Team aims to represent every undergraduate business major at the University of Cincinnati.
general_info:

mission: The Lindner College of Business Student Action TEam will form a united undergraduate student body with the Carl H. Lindner College of Business that encourages an engaging atmosphere to foster student innovation, and allows students to pursue opportunities through tangible actions to establish a legacy of bettering the University of Cincinnati.
name: Carl H. Lindner College of Business Student Action Team
